attributes.action: to stop deporting Gays, Lesbians, Bisexuals, Transgendered and Intersex people to countries where they may be imprisoned, tortured or executed because of their sexuality and Gender.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent cases have highlighted the extreme danger that people who identify as LGBTI face because of their sexuality and gender differences if deported to a number of countries.

People do not choose to be LGBTI they are born this way.

Sending people back to their possible death or torture is totally unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
